extendedInfo.description: Check this quiz, if you are one of the wise ones! Lots of geography questions, like which one is the largest river in the world, and which city is the capital of UK, are hasd.You can also check your knowledge of proverbs, and see if you can be called The Wisest of all! Then, there are a few questions from economy, history, and demographics too. Do you know which country is the most populated one in the world? Or which currency is used in India?Check out this highly entertaining trivia, which will enlighten you!quiz, history, demographics, economy, geography, proverbs, wise, smart

reviews.comment: Wow! This is quite possibly the worst app I have ever seen! Stupid questions, wrong answers. Just useless! Wow!
reviews.author: A Google User
